Test Name: MISC University of Florida Testing (biochemical, immunological, hematological, microbiological assays)
Specimen Type: Varies (e.g., blood, serum, plasma, urine, swabs) depending on the specific assay
Purpose: To generate accurate and reliable laboratory results across multiple assay types in compliance with CLIA guidelines.
Container: Appropriate specimen collection container per specific test (e.g., serum separator tube, EDTA tube, sterile container)
Equipment: Various calibrated laboratory analyzers and instruments specified by individual test protocols
